attributes.action: Make this country independent of oil and gas supplies by producing electricity from atomic wind or tidal power and encourage electric central heating and cars
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We are being held to ransom by the oil producing countries and Russia for our oil and gas.If we encourage the use of electric central heating and electric or compressed air cars we can make our country totally electric by producing electricity from atomic,wind or tidal power -getting uranium from Australia or burning our own home produced coal.
